description.en: Telokanda is a network of blockchain enthusiasts from around the world collaboratively building great projects using blockchain technology, skills, and passion. Telokanda is popularly known for its advertising project on telos blockchain which rewards users with Kanda tokens for clicking on content posted on the telokanda ads network. Beyond the advertisement platform, the telokanda network also has several other projects hosted on telos blockchain and other blockchains like TLOS HIVE, EOSIO, etc. These projects and partnerships, launched on the telokanda sub-domains keep increasing the utility and liquidity of the KANDA tokens and other telokanda related for tokens investors and holders.
